name: SOLE MILITARY ACTION
description: Base establishment by state forces; remote violence involving state military with no reported casualties; non-violent military operations

name: MILITARY VERSUS MILITARY
description: Military in-fighting; battles between a military and mutinous forces; arrests of military officials

name: MILITARY VERSUS REBELS
description: Civil war violence between state forces and a rebel actor

name: MILITARY VERSUS POLITICAL MILITIA
description: Violence between state forces and unidentified armed groups; violence between police and political party militias

name: MILITARY VERSUS COMMUNAL MILITIA
description: Military engagement with a communal militia

name: MILITARY VERSUS RIOTERS
description: Suppression of a demonstration by police or military

name: MILITARY VERSUS PROTESTERS
description: Suppression of a demonstration by police or military

name: MILITARY VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: State repression of civilians; arrests by police

name: MILITARY VERSUS OTHER
description: Inter-state conflict; state engagement with private security forces or a UN operation; strategic developments between a regime and the UN or another external actor

name: SOLE REBEL ACTION
description: Base establishment; remote violence involving rebel groups with no reported target; accidental detonation by a rebel group

name: REBELS VERSUS REBELS
description: Rebel in-fighting; violence between rebel groups and their splinter movements

name: REBELS VERSUS POLITICAL MILIITA
description: Civil war violence between rebels and a pro-government militia; violence between rebels and unidentified armed groups

name: REBELS VERSUS COMMUNAL MILITIA
description: Violence between rebels and local security providers

name: REBELS VERSUS RIOTERS
description: Spontaneous violence against a rebel group; a violent demonstration engaging a rebel group

name: REBELS VERSUS PROTESTERS
description: Violence against protesters by rebels

name: REBELS VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: Rebel targeting of civilians [a strategy commonly used in civil war]

name: REBELS VERSUS OTHERS
description: Civil war violence between rebels and an allied state military; rebel violence against a UN operation

name: SOLE POLITICAL MILITIA ACTION
description: Remote violence by an unidentified armed group with no reported target; accidental detonation by a political militia; strategic arson as intimidation by a political party

name: POLITICAL MILITIA VERSUS POLITICAL MILITIA
description: Inter-elite violence

name: POLITICAL MILITIA VERSUS COMMUNAL MILITIA
description: Violence between communal militia and an unidentified armed group; violence between political militia and local security providers

name: POLITICAL MILITIA VERSUS RIOTERS
description: Violent demonstration against a political party; spontaneous violence against a political party

name: POLITICAL MILITIA VERSUS PROTESTERS
description: Peaceful demonstration engaging a political party

name: POLITICAL MILITIA VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: Out-sourced state repression carried out by pro-government militias; civilian targeting by political militias or unidentified armed groups

name: POLITICAL MILITIA VERSUS OTHERS
description: Violence between private security forces and unidentified armed groups; violence between pro-government militia and external state military forces

name: SOLE COMMUNAL MILITIA ACTION
description: Destruction of property by a communal militia; establishment of a local security militia

name: COMMUNAL MILITIA VERSUS COMMUNAL MILITIA
description: Intercommunal violence

name: COMMUNAL MILITIA VERSUS RIOTERS
description: Violent demonstration against an identity militia; spontaneous violence against an identity militia

name: COMMUNAL MILITIA VERSUS PROTESTERS
description: Peaceful demonstration engaging an identity militia

name: COMMUNAL MILITIA VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: Civilian targeting especially in the context of intercommunal violence

name: COMMUNAL MILITIA VERSUS OTHER
description: External state military engaging in violence against a communal militia

name: SOLE RIOTER ACTION
description: 1-sided violent demonstration; spontaneous arson

name: RIOTERS VERSUS RIOTERS
description: 2-sided violent demonstration in which both sides engage in violence

name: RIOTERS VERSUS PROTESTERS
description: 2-sided demonstration in which only 1 side engages in violence

name: RIOTERS VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: Violent demonstration in which civilians are injured/killed; spontaneous violence in which civilians are targeted by a mob

name: RIOTERS VERSUS OTHERS
description: Mob violence against regional or international operation

name: SOLE PROTESTER ACTION
description: 1-sided peaceful protest

name: PROTESTERS VERSUS PROTESTERS
description: 2-sided peaceful protest

name: PROTESTERS VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: Peaceful protesters engaging civilians

name: PROTESTERS VERSUS OTHER
description: Peaceful demonstration engaging private security forces

name: OTHER ACTOR VERSUS CIVILIANS
description: Regional or international operation targeting civilians; private security forces targeting civilians

name: SOLE OTHER ACTION
description: Strategic developments involving international or regional operations; remote violence by external military forces with no reported target; non-violent external military operations
